====== get ======
{#JAPI Joomla.Framework Cache JCachePage::get #}

Get the cached page data

===== Syntax =====
boolean get	( **$id**, **$group** )

| **$id** | string | The cache data id |
| **$group** | string | The cache data group |

===== Examples =====
<code php|Example>

</code>
